items.title: FSN E-commerce stock in the radar with mid-twenties revenue surge in Q2
items.description: Nomura saw FSN E-commerce's Q2 revenue growth in a positive light, suggesting that improvement for the company was on track, led by its beauty and personal care segment.

items.title: Paras Defence closes QIP, sets issue price at Rs 1,045 per share; stock in focus
items.description: Paras Defence closes its QIP issue, setting the share price at Rs 1,045, after raising funds by allotting 12.93 lakh shares. So far in 2024, the stock has risen 36 percent.

items.description: Lemon Tree Hotels Share Price | The share touched a 52-week high of Rs 158.05 and a 52-week low of Rs 100.75 on 06 May, 2024 and 26 October, 2023, respectively.

items.description: Zodiac Energy Share Price | The share touched a 52-week high of Rs 819.40 and a 52-week low of Rs 124.25 on 13 August, 2024 and 09 October, 2023, respectively.

items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: GIFT Nifty indicates a negative start; US, Asian markets fall
items.description: Sensex Today | Stock Market LIVE Updates: Wall Street's three major indexes closed down around 1% on Monday while Treasury yields rose, as traders tamped down bets for Federal Reserve interest-rate easing and worried about the Middle East conflict's impact on oil prices. The Dow Jones Industrial Average fell 398.51 points, or 0.94%, to 41,954.24, the S&P 500 lost 55.13 points, or 0.96%, to 5,695.94 and the Nasdaq Composite lost 213.94 points, or 1.18%, to 17,923.90.

items.title: Trade Spotlight: How should you trade HDFC Bank, Infosys, eMudhra, RR Kabel, Vedanta and others on Tuesday?
items.description: The market is likely to extend its southward journey if it fails to hold the previous day's low. Until then, consolidation can't be ruled out. Below are some trading ideas for the near term.

items.title: Stock Radar: Tata Motors, Nykaa, Zodiac Energy, BEL, Eraaya Lifespaces, Hi-Tech Pipes in focus on Tuesday
items.description: Swelect Energy Systems, Puravankara, HDFC Bank, IRCON International, HEG, Cholamandalam Investment and Finance Company, Lemon Tree Hotels, and Exicom Tele-Systems will also be in focus on October 8.

items.title: Nifty down 6% from record peaks; worst yet to come? | HDFC Bank, Nykaa in focus | Opening Bell
items.description: Indian benchmarks Sensex and Nifty extended selloff to sixth straight day as fears of ongoing geopolitical tensions and China opportunistic continued to rattle investors. Barring Nifty IT, all sectors nosedived in the sea of red, wiping off Rs 25 lakh crore investor wealth. Going ahead, experts expect Nifty to face resistance at 25,000, with support around 24,500. This morning global cues are mixed. US markets ended lower overnight, while Chinese markets led gains in Asia-Pacific markets. Meanwhile, brent crude holds above $80 per barrel, its highest level since August. Among stocks in focus, watch out for HDFC Bank, Nykaa, Sobha, among others. Catch Lovisha Darad in conversation with Ajit Mishra, Senior Vice President- Research, Religare Broking and Raj Vyas, Vice-President - Research, Teji Mandi.

items.title: BEL bags additional orders worth over Rs 500 crore, stock in focus
items.description: BELâ€™s order book has surged to Rs 7,689 crore this fiscal, driven by new contracts, with a target of Rs 25,000 crore in FY25 as international brokerages remain bullish on the stock.

items.description: Festive demand and rural recovery remain key growth drivers

items.title: Tata Power, JSW Energy stocks get buy call from Nomura; up to 32% upside seen amid strong outlook
items.description: Shares of Tata Power and JSW Energy rose after Nomura initiated coverage, recommending 'buy' ratings with target prices of Rs 560 and Rs 885, respectively, due to strong growth prospects in their renewable energy sectors.

items.title: M&M shares rise 2% as CLSA upgrades to 'outperform'
items.description: CLSA anticipates a revival in the domestic tractor industry from FY26, with favorable reservoir levels as a key driver.

items.title: Tata Motors share price extends losses, down 3% as UBS keeps 'sell'
items.description: UBS notes that China is no longer a fast-growing market for global carmakers, and while premium cars might show some resilience, market share losses are likely to continue.

items.title: Agri Picks Report October 08, 2024: Geojit Financial Services
items.description: According to Geojit, India's spice exports fell 2% on-year to 534,706 tonnes in Apr-Jul, according to the data from the Spices Board of India.

items.title: Paramount Dye Tec lists at 6% discount over IPO price on NSE SME
items.description: Paramount Dye Tec SME IPO received robust investor interest after the issue was subscribed 50 times over three days.

items.title: Metal stocks melt as China state planner's stimulus plans disappoint, iron ore prices tumble
items.description: China's National Development and Reform Commission (NDRC) disappointed investors by withholding major new stimulus measures, despite expressing confidence in meeting the country's economic target for the year.

items.title: Stocks on Radar | Tata Motors,  Hi-Tech Pipes, HDFC Bank, IRCON International In Focus
items.description: Today weâ€™re focusing on key stocks making headlines in the market. Tata Motorsâ€™ Jaguar Land Rover reported a 3% YoY decline in retail sales, while Hi-Tech Pipes launched a QIP with a floor price of Rs 194.98 to raise up to Rs 600 crore. HDFC Bank approved the sale of its 100% stake in HDFC Education for Rs 192 crore, adhering to RBI mandates. Meanwhile, IRCON International faces a Rs 38.71 crore claim from Apex Buildsys over a project dispute, and Eraaya Lifespacesâ€™ subsidiary, Ebix Cash, secured a Rs 138.75 crore contract with Punjab National Bank for network integration services. Stay tuned for more insights! If you enjoyed this update, please like, subscribe, and hit the bell icon for notifications.

items.title: Stock of the Day| 360 ONE WAM - Is it a worthy stock to bet?
items.description:
360 ONE WAM is a wealth manager with assets worth more than Rs 500,000 crore at the end of the June quarter. Its business is on a growth path, driven by rising millionaires and billionaires seeking wealth advice. The company reported its highest-ever quarterly profit in Q1 FY25 even after providing for an exceptional expense.
The managementâ€™s strategy of focusing on increasing the share of annual recurring revenue  is encouraging and has helped reduce the volatility in revenue. Wealth management opportunity in the country is huge and the stock of 360 ONE WAM is a good bet

items.description: Shares of Zomato climbed over 2 percent after HSBC raised its target to Rs 330, citing stabilizing competition and Blinkitâ€™s edge over Swiggy in quick commerce.

items.title: Nifty Media top sectoral gainer, soars 3%; PVR, TV Today, Network18 lead rally
items.description: Media stocks surged in trade, tracking a rebound in the broader market. Sentiment for media stocks seem to be improving amid expectations of a recovery in the second half of FY25,backed by hopes of stronger ad revenues and box office collections from Q3.
